thread.title: Labor Department Proposal Would Have Hobbled Recent Hand-Holding, Fidelity Says
thread.title_full: Labor Department Proposal Would Have Hobbled Recent Hand-Holding, Fidelity Says - WSJ

author: Anna Prior
title: Labor Department Proposal Would Have Hobbled Recent Hand-Holding, Fidelity Says
text:
On Aug. 24, when the Dow Jones Industrial Average briefly plummeted more than 1,000 points in the first six minutes of trading, the volume of calls to Fidelity Investments’ toll-free numbers was 50% higher than for a typical summer Monday.
A large number of the callers were asking what they should or shouldn’t do, says John Sweeney, executive vice president of retirement and investing strategies at the Boston financial-services... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
